text: kya tumane moosa ke pashchaat isaraeel kee santaan ke saradaaron ko nahin dekha, jab unhonne apane ek nabee se kaha, "hamaare lie ek samraat niyukt kar do taaki ham allaah ke maarg mein yuddh karen?" usane kaha, "yadi tumhen ladaee ka aadesh diya jae to kya tumhaare baare mein yah sambhaavana nahin hai ki tum na lado?" ve kahane lage, "ham allaah ke maarg mein kyon na lade, jabaki ham apane gharon se nikaal die gae hai aur apane baal-bachchon se bhee alag kar die gae hai?" - phir jab unapar yuddh anivaary kar diya gaya to unamen se thode logon ke siva sab phir gae. aur allaah zaalimon ko bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai.
